Title: US and partners will aim to supply 15 bn m3 more of gas to Europe this year
Description: The US, together with its international partners, will aim to supply the European Union with at least 15 bn m3 more of LNG this year as part of an effort to help Europe reduce its dependence on Russian fossil fuels and strengthen European energy security as Russia continues to wage its war on Ukraine.
Author: CK

Title: US LNG exports to reach new high in March; trend of higher exports to Europe continues
Description: US LNG exports are poised to reach a new record high this month, thanks to the start of exports of commissioning cargoes from the 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass plant and a ramp up in shipments at the 30 mtpa Sabine Pass export project.
Author: CK

Title: Venture Global’s Calcasieu Pass ships fourth LNG cargo as loading pace quickens
Description: US project developer Venture Global’s 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass LNG plant has shipped its fourth LNG cargo since exports of the plants commissioning cargoes began on Mar. 1.
Author: CK
